# [Interview #690: Twitter: Brandonothology collection, Entry #23](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=690#23)

#### jeremy208

Can we expect any short stories set in the
*Warbreaker*
world anytime soon?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Short stories in
*Warbreaker*
world are unlikely. I’m working on some Mistborn ones, though. If I were going to do more
*Warbreaker*
, I’d just write the sequel,
*Nightblood*
.
